Sinopse: Philo Beddoe (Clint Eastwood) takes part in a bare knuckle fight, as he does, to make some more money than he can earn from his car repair business. A motorcycle gang and an orangutan called Clyde (C.J. the Orangutan) all add to the "fun".—Colin Tinto
